com.gemplus.opencard.terminal
Class APDUDataInputStream

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.gemplus.opencard.terminal.APDUDataInputStream
public class APDUDataInputStream
extends java.lang.Object

Class APDUDataInputStream provides facilities to decode an APDU response field. An input stream can be build from a byte array or directly a ResponseAPDU object. Stream can be read as byte, short or int or arrays of those types.

See Also:
ResponseAPDU, APDUDataOutputStream

Constructor Detail

APDUDataInputStream

public APDUDataInputStream(byte[] data)
Constructs an APDUDataInputStream object. This stream lets an application read primitive Java data types from an underlying APDU data (passed as an array of bytes).
Parameters:
data - array on which is applied the stream

APDUDataInputStream

public APDUDataInputStream(opencard.core.terminal.ResponseAPDU response)
Constructs an APDUDataInputStream object. This stream lets an application read primitive Java data types from an underlying APDU data (passed as an APDU response).
Parameters:
response - APDU response on which data is applied the stream
